name: Pango_TV_LiveForAlexa
0:
”Alexa, turn off Smart TV.”
”Alexa, channel up on Smart TV.”
”Alexa, change to hdmi one on Smart TV.”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Skill features: turn off the TV, change the channel, and change the input source.
Support devices:Google TV,Andriod TV.
 This skill uses the pre-installed "AlexaControls" app on Smart TV to control Smart TV via Alexa.
 The skill will require an account link, which requires your Amazon account, and use OAuth to link accounts.After enabling this skill from Amazon Alexa App, you can enter your Amazon account and password in the Amazon OAuth web page. 
 Then login with the same username in the "AlexaControls" app on your Smart TV.So your device can be discovered by the skill,and enjoy your Alexa now.
